clientSide.stubs

Class BarStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.BarStub

  • public class BarStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the bar stub It instantiates a remote reference to the bar stub. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String serverHostName
      Name of the platform where is located the bar server.
      private int serverPortNumb
      Port number for listening to service requests.

      Instantiation of a stub to the bar.
